metadata.synopsis: PAD about the character saying out loud that the items in front of them (two magical items to equip and one relevant key) are protected by magic.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter S_LOW_RamazithTower_KnowledgeCheck_64613253-a368-4c30-9a47-a099af380e30 and have a success in an Arcana Roll (Act 3, medium).

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like they're warded from within the tower. Must be something around here that can help.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Looks like some high value items. Wonder if they can get gotten...
